scone.utility



enum fg: int;
enum bg: int;
All colors 
//Available colors:
init

black
blue
blue_dark
cyan
cyan_dark
gray
gray_dark
green
green_dark
magenta
magenta_dark
red
red_dark
white
yellow
yellow_dark


struct Slot;
Slot structure

Examples:
Slot slot1 = Slot('d', fg.red, bg.white); //'d' character with RED foreground color and WHITE background color
Slot slot2 = Slot('g');

auto window = new Frame();
window.write(0,0, slot1);
window.write(0,1, slot2);
